title: The Writer's Almanac for Sunday, January 2, 2022
description: American Cartoonist Lynda Barry turns 65 today. And,it’s the birthday of author Isaac Asimov (1920) who has books in all 10 categories of the Dewey Decimal System.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
